core.classes.Profile module¶

class Profile(firstname: Optional[classes.types.OpseStr.OpseStr] = None, lastname: Optional[classes.types.OpseStr.OpseStr] = None, lst_middlenames: list[classes.types.OpseStr.OpseStr] = [], gender: Optional[classes.types.OpseStr.OpseStr] = None, birthdate: Optional[classes.types.OpseDate.OpseDate] = None, deathdate: Optional[classes.types.OpseDate.OpseDate] = None, age: Optional[classes.types.OpseInt.OpseInt] = None, lst_phone_numbers: list[classes.types.OpseStr.OpseStr] = [], lst_usernames: list[classes.types.OpseStr.OpseStr] = [], lst_emails: list[classes.types.OpseStr.OpseStr] = [], lst_accounts: list[classes.account.Account.Account] = [], lst_pictures: list[classes.types.OpseStr.OpseStr] = [], lst_ips: list[classes.types.OpseStr.OpseStr] = [], lst_addresses: list[classes.types.OpseAddress.OpseAddress] = [], lst_locations: list[classes.types.OpseLocation.OpseLocation] = [], lst_organizations: list[classes.organization.Organization.Organization] = [], political_orientation: Optional[classes.types.OpseStr.OpseStr] = None)¶

Bases: object

Class that represents a Profile in OPSE context.

calc_age()¶

Method that calculates the age between the birth and the death dates. Set the profile age with the result.

Raises

TypeError – If birth date is missing.

clone() → core.classes.Profile.T¶

A deepcopy of the profile.

classmethod get_profile(profile_id: str) → core.classes.Profile.T¶

Return a Profile from an identifier.

If the identifier given to the function is not linked to a Profile, then the function will return None.

Parameters

Returns

The desire profile.

core.classes.Research module¶

class Research(default_profile: classes.Profile.Profile)¶

Bases: object

Class that represents a Reseach in OPSE context.

anonymise_unvisible_data(profile_to_dict: dict) → dict¶

Method that takes a generated dictionary from to_dict() function and masks data which are set to ‘unvisible’ in the profiles visibility setting.

Parameters

profile_to_dict (dict) – The profile to anonymize.

Returns

A dictionary profile containing masked data.

Return type

dict

enrich_profiles()¶

Method that enriches the profile list depending on data available in the current profile(s).

The objective is to get more profiles from an existing profile.

get_id() → str¶

Getter of the research identifier.

Returns

The research identifier.

Return type

str

get_linked_id() → dict¶

Method that returns all linked identifiers to a this Research.

It is used to manage permissions.

Returns

A dictionary containing the research identifier and a list of all the profile’s identifiers.

Return type

dict

get_lst_profile() → list[classes.Profile.Profile]¶

Getter of the research’s list of profiles.

Returns

The list of profiles found.

Return type

list[Profile]

Returns

classmethod get_research(research_id: str) → core.classes.Research.T¶

Return a Research from an identifier.

If the identifier given to the function is not linked to a Research, then the function will return None.

Returns

The desire research.

Return type

static merge_profile(lst_profile: list[classes.Profile.Profile] = []) → classes.Profile.Profile¶

Method that will try to merge profiles.

Merge if values do not produce conflicts.

Parameters

lst_profile (list[Profile], optional) – The list of all profiles, defaults to [].

Returns

The merged profile or None if it didn’t work.

Return type

Profile

remove_profile(profile: classes.Profile.Profile)¶

Method that removes a profile and deletes it from the memory.

Parameters

profile (Profile) – The profile to remove.

Parameters
